definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: In Nogales, it is illegal to wear suspenders.
sentences.chinese: 在諾加萊斯，穿用腹帶違法。

sentences.english: The hardest part was fastening the corset, which she managed after a fashion.
sentences.chinese: 按着時尚，她把腹帶緊束到最難忍的部位。
